briefTitle: Extension Study to Evaluate Long Term Safety of Denosumab in Subjects Undergoing ADT for Non-Metastatic Prostate Cancer
officialTitle: An Open Label, Single Arm, Extension Study to Evaluate the Long Term Safety of Denosumab (AMG 162) in the Treatment of Bone Loss in Subjects Undergoing Androgen-Deprivation Therapy for Non-Metastatic Prostate Cancer
summary: The purpose of this study is to describe the safety and tolerability of up to 5 years (ie, 3 years under the 20040138 Amgen study and 2 years on this study) denosumab administration as measured by adverse events, immunogenicity, and safety laboratory parameters in subjects who previously received denosumab for non-metastatic prostate cancer.
